Text:
Let us pray.
In Your kindness, Lord, shine Your light upon our night. [t] Illuminate Your servants' slumber with the presence of Your peace. [*] May the brightness of the new day stir us from our rest. Awaken us with joy for Your Name, through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
